data: {"generalSituation":"The winter monsoon will bring cold and dry weather to the coast of Guangdong tomorrow. With the monsoon moderating slightly, temperatures will rise slightly over the region in the following couple of days but it will still be cool in the morning. A replenishment of the monsoon is expected to reach the coast of Guangdong later on Monday. Temperatures over the region will fall again midweek next week. The weather will be persistently fine and very dry with rather large temperature difference between day and night.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260103","week":"Saturday","forecastWind":"North to northeast force 4 to 5, occasionally force 6 on high ground.","forecastWeather":"Fine and dry.
